comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mr. and Mrs. RAC Smith and Mrs. JF Day, according to the image caption. Same folks are in this one (in different clothes): [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163113221/] Robert A. C. Smith (1857-1933), NYC Commissioner of Docks: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R.A.C._Smith

comment.author: 99217767@N00
comment._content: Not a happy looking group are they?  This must have been before the smile was invented...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Sorry for the mixup.  This is one of five captions and images that got out of alignment back when the negatives were first scanned. This photo sure shows the Smiths and Mrs. Day, not Henry Saunderson.
